Package linefit

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HasOptionsToDisplay
    This interface should be used for classes and objects that have options that should be displayed in the GUI so that the user can change them.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    About
    This class creates the string that is used in the about window
    CheckOS
    This class checks to see if the user is running this program on a Mac so we can fix the copy and paste error from tables as well as other things specific to a Mac such as line endings
    ColorBoxRenderer
    This class renders the square of color instead of a string in the drop down menu for selecting the line's color and renders a custom color option that users can select if none of the defined colors are suitable or more color options are needed
    CustomColorMenu
    A Class that extends JDialog that allows the user to choose custom colors to use for the lines
    DataColumn
    This class provides the columns for the GraphSet that are used to input and store data
    DataDimension.StaticFields
    An internal class for allowing the enums to have integers and strings associated with them while being able to easily determine how many are defined in this enum
    DataSet
    The class that keeps track of the data in each DataSet in the GraphArea.
    DataSetTableModel
    This class Creates the Table Model for the GraphSet's data and controls the behavior for the GraphSet data table so that we can remove columns and see if it is empty
    GraphArea
    The main interface of LineFit.
    GraphOptionsMenu
    This class handles the creation and the display of the graph options menu
    LineFit
    The main operating class in LineFit that is called on start up and sets up the base and layout and that handles all the functions calls and methods of the program
    OnlyAllowNumbersListener
    A private Listener class that implements FocusListener so that we can save the value when the field is first focused on so that we can return it to the field's preselected value if the input was not a valid number String.
    ScientificNotation
    This class contains helper functions that converts numbers as doubles to a string in scientific notation.
    ShapeBoxRenderer
    The class that allows us to display a shape in the shapeSelector instead of its class name in the drop down menu
    SpreadSheetAdapter
    ExcelAdapter enables Copy-Paste Clipboard functionality on JTables.
    TabsFocusTraversalPolicy
    A listener that is called when the user hits the tabs key that sets the order through which the options in the options menu are focused in
    Utils
    This class contains some functionality related to other LineFit classes that either are used in multiple classes or potentially could be.
    Version
    This class serves as a Macro for the current version number of LineFit
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DataDimension
    The enum class that contains the different dimensions that LineFit uses as well as some convenience functions for displaying them and converting them to numbers
    Version.VersionComparisonResult
    Enum class for the return value of version comparisons
